title: Darwin on death of Tamerlane MCQ 1

content.question: Which of the following developments in the late fifteenth century could best be used as evidence to support Darwinâ€™s argument in the second paragraph regarding a change in patterns of long-distance trade?

choices.label: The growing naval power of the Ottoman Empire in the Mediterranean
The discovery of maritime routes that linked Europe and Asia through the Indian Ocean
The naval expeditions of the Ming admiral Zheng He
The development of the Atlantic system that linked Europe to the Americas and Africa

content.answer: The discovery of maritime routes that linked Europe and Asia through the Indian Ocean

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
